body.name: PCCOOLER 120mm Case Fan 3 Pack Dual Light Loop Series, Premium RGB PWM Fan with Controller, Advanced Customization with 7 Colors & 10 Lighting Modes, High Performance Computer Cooling Fan for PC Case
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【Addressable RGB Lighting】Dual halo addressable RGB lighting, 24 individually controllable FRGB LEDs, provide you with colorful visual effects
【PWM Smart Control】Dynamic speed adjustment between 650 RPM to 1800 RPM, providing maximum airflow with minimum noise.

【High Performance Static Pressure Blades】The unique 7-blade design can minimize drag and further improve case fan performance. It achieves 31CFM at 1800 rpm, maintaining low noise operation while improving overall airflow.

【High-performance hydraulic bearing】High-performance hydraulic bearing and high-performance sleeve bearing are adopted. It can absorb and preserve lubricating oil, effectively reduce wear and noise, and the bearing life can reach more than 40,000 hours.
【Wide Compatibility】5V 3Pin RGB connector is compatible with most motherboards Aura Mystic Light and Polychome Sync that support addressable RGB.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Knockoff CoolerMaster Halo Fans!
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: Being new to PC building, I confirmed with the seller that the reason for the cluster of connectors is for daisy-chaining, eliminating the need for any hub! Since I’ve done this, my build looks much cleaner and organized. Grab these fans while they’re available, because I’m sure they will go out of stock again at some point!I picked up these fans when I saw some YouTube reviews and was going to transfer all of my PC parts into a brand new case, where I had the freedom to choose what fans I wanted. I always loved the dual ring halo look on fans like this, but did not want to pay the hefty CoolerMaster price tag. Here comes PCCooler in the clutch with these cheap but durable quality knockoff fans. I love the braided cables, rubber corners, the brightness, speed, little to no noise, and overall performance of these fans. I didn’t use the remote function or the hub that came with the 3-pack, but I purchased and used the much larger hub instead and that all worked with my motherboard.The only knock I would give this product is the two cables being chained together, creating a cluster of 4 connectors. It can be a wreck trying to organize but it’s worth it when you think about how much was spent on these fans. Can’t complain!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fans for cheap price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Fans work super wellVery quietAnd move alot of air

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fans are beautiful and add a bit of cooling to my case. The ARGB works flawlessly. My only problem is the fans only spin up to about 2/3 of the advertised speed, so the cooling isn't as good as I had hoped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars On PAR with CoolerMaster premium fans!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These were some of the best fans I have come across that people consider “budget fans”. Not too loud, gorgeous consistent, bright RGB effects, and the double Halo look from the sides is awesome. They can be a bit on the loud side at full rotation(1400 rpm), but most of us gamers are wearing headsets so not a big deal. They actually worked quite well as my radiator fans. It’s also worth noting that they put some quality into their builds. OH! And let’s not forget to mention they actually manage to center the fan stickers! I cannot tell you how many budget fan sets I’ve tried out and had crazy wobbly Art going on in my build 🤪 Give this company(especially these fans) a go and I bet you’ll love them! 💕

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fans, Very quite, don’t feel cheap.
reviews.reviewText: I Highly recommend these fans. They are very quiet, and the RGB looks great. They use a standard 3-pin rgb plug (not a proprietary plug) so you can plug them directly into your Motherboard if it has 3-pin 5v ARGB headers. If not the included controller works good too. The PWM fans work great with my Asrock motherboard fan tuning software. They run super quiet even at full speed. The only noise you hear is air moving, and they move plenty of it. They feel like a high quality product not cheap or flimsy. Definitely worth the money. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Good BUT
reviews.reviewText: great silent ARGB fans with great airflow and gorgeous looks, but... maaaaaaan, I've been searching land and sea to get my hands on 4 more and it seems like they got dissapeared from existence, even in their webpage or their discontinued list, no clue anywhere... they got me sitting with half gorgeous case and a click of OCD until they come back to stock
